docs.lead_paragraph: Even though vaccines are among the most important and effective weapons of public health, American pharmaceutical firms for more than a decade have been dropping out of the business.

headline.main: Vaccine: Low Profits and High Liability; Sizable Tranquilizer Market Wider Vaccine Use Sought Vaccine: Low Profits And High Liability A Chimpanzee Shortage The Problem of Liability

docs.abstract: Article on trend away from vaccine research and mfg; attributes trend relative unprofitability, govt regulations and increasingly troublesome and potentially costly product liability protection; traces Merck & Cos research on hepatitis vaccine and notes several other principal vaccine mfrs currently operating in US; drawings (L)
docs.snippet: Even though vaccines are among the most important and effective weapons of public health, American pharmaceutical firms for more than a decade have been dropping out of the business.
